Title: Relates to making a city school district in N.Y. city eligible for transitional aid for charter school payments
Summary: Relates to making a city school district in a city having a population of one million or more eligible for transitional aid for charter school payments.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to making a city school district in a city having a population of one million or more eligible for transitional aid for charter school payments
